content: the last st and slip_stitch join using the backwards method into the first st 93 st 5 camel stitch row chain 1 single_crochet into the third loop of the same st single_crochet in the third loop around join with a sl st into the first st ensuring the st is in line with the chain 3 from the star in the row below 93 st 6 repeat row 3 7 repeat row 4 8 repeat row 5 9 repeat row 3 10 repeat row 4 join with a slip_stitch into the first st and change to colour a 11 chain 1 single_crochet in each st around single_crochet in the slip_stitch from last st join using the backwards method into the top of the chain 1 93 st note for a tighter finish change back to the 4mm hook 12 chain 1 using the camel stitch work a half_double_crochet into the third loop of each st around slip_stitch to join 93 st end off © emmeclaire crochet 2017 10
